description: Details required by Condition 6 (Construction Logistics Plan) of Planning Permission 19/01043/FUL (Change of use of existing A1 retail unit at 9 High Street to B1(a) office use to allow for the enlargement of, and internal and external improvements to Apex Tower entrance and reception; single storey rear extension to provide new commuter facilities and installation of associated plant; erection of bin store; and improvements to rear car park and cycle parking facilities)
decision_conditions: The details submitted for Condition 6 (Construction Logistics Plan) of Planning Permission 19/01043/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and this condition is hereby fully discharged.

Unless clearly specified otherwise, the base of the development shown on the approved plans is taken to be external ground level, and not a Damp Proof Course or Internal Finished Floor Level. The external ground level is expected to remain consistent before and after construction of the approved development unless specified otherwise on the approved plans.

The fee required for your planning application is Â£145.00.  Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002, by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames or online via the Kingston council website.
